nodes.text: The Annaj system was a star system located in the Outer Rim Territories' Moddell sector, at the end of the Spar Trade Route and containing the astronomical object Annaj. During the Battle of Endor's final moments, after the second Death Star and the Executor-class Star Dreadnought Executor were destroyed, Imperial Vice Admiral Rae Sloane sent coordinates to all remaining Imperial vessels and ordered them to jump immediately to the Annaj system, effectively ending the battle.
